name: Epoxy
short_description: A tool to integrate common data schemas across the layers of a multi-tier application. Data schemas could be simple or complex and aspects such as persistence, security, and validation can be automatically weaved through each tier with one schema source.

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Grouping and Descriptive Categories :: OS Portable (Source code to work with many OS platforms)
